title: vultor
author: vultor
created_time: June 16, 2023, 12:12:32 PMLast edit: June 25, 2023, 03:03:39 PM by vultor
content: Vultor Bounty Campaign - Earn Tokens for Your Engagement!We are excited to announce the Vultor Bounty Campaign, where you can earn valuable VLT tokens for participating in various activities and helping us spread the word about our innovative payment solution. Join us and be part of the Vultor revolution!Bounty Rewards:We have set aside a generous reward pool of $100,000 equivalent in VLT tokens for the bounty campaign. With the current VLT price at $0.35, this means there are a total of 625,000 VLT tokens up for grabs!Activity-Based Rewards:1. Tweeting: Earn 50 VLT tokens for each tweet you make about Vultor. Be sure to include the hashtag #Vultor and mention our Twitter handle @vultorpay in your tweet. You can earn up to 50 VLT tokens for tweeting.2. YouTube Video Posting: Create a video on YouTube that highlights the features and benefits of Vultor. The video should be at least 3 minutes long and must include a link to our website in the description. Earn 200 VLT tokens for each approved explainer video.3. Join Telegram Group: Join our official Telegram group and stay active. Earn 20 VLT tokens for joining and an additional 10 VLT tokens for each week of active participation. You can earn up to 50 VLT tokens for staying engaged in the group.4. Follow us on Twitter: Follow our official Twitter account @vultorpay and earn 50 VLT tokens.5. Follow us on Instagram: Follow our official Instagram account @vultorpayments and earn 45 VLT tokens.Whitepaper Translation Rewards:We are also offering rewards for translating the Vultor whitepaper into different languages. If you are proficient in a language other than English, you can earn up to 5000 VLT tokens for translating and providing a high-quality version of the whitepaper in your chosen language. Please contact us at bounty@vultor.io for more information on participating in the whitepaper translation bounty.How to Participate:1. Join our Telegram group: https://t.me/vultorchannel2. Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/vultorpay3. Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/vultorpayments4. Make tweets using the #Vultor hashtag and mention @vultorpay.5. Create and upload your YouTube video, ensuring you include a link to our website.6. Join Discord Keep regular engagement https://discord.gg/VULTORTerms and Conditions:- Participants must provide proof of their activities by submitting the necessary information to bounty@vultor.io.- Rewards will be distributed at the end of the bounty campaign.- The Vultor team reserves the right to disqualify participants who engage in unethical or fraudulent activities.Don't miss out on this opportunity to earn VLT tokens while supporting Vultor! Help us spread the word and be part of the future of payments. Stay tuned for more exciting updates from Vultor!For more information about Vultor, please visit our website: https://vultor.ioJoin our Telegram group: https://t.me/vultorpayFollow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/vultorpayFollow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vultorpayments/?hl=enFollow Our Discord https://discord.gg/VULTOR
